sentence: Why cant train drivers be sentenced to the electric chair? because theyre bad conductors.
explanation: Refers to someone who leads or manages an orchestra or an event (first meaning) and a train driver (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: The conductor of the orchestra led the performance beautifully.
second_new_sentence: The train conductor called all passengers to board the train.

sentence: Why dont women have mens brains? because they dont have penises to put them in.
explanation: The organ responsible for thought and cognition (first meaning) and the idiom suggesting a not-so-smart notion (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: The human brain is a complex organ responsible for processing information.
second_new_sentence: He couldnt think clearly and his brain felt foggy after staying up too late.

sentence: We recently sold my vacuum cleaner all it was doing was gathering dust
explanation: Fine particles accumulated on surfaces (first meaning) and to dismiss something or not take action (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: The dust settled on the furniture after a long winter.
second_new_sentence: She decided to dust off the old plans and give them another look.

sentence: Whats the difference between a cowardly sex offender and your job? your job will always suck
explanation: To draw in air through the mouth (first meaning) and to perform poorly or be unsatisfactory (second meaning).
first_new_sentence: The vacuum will suck up all the dirt from the carpet.
second_new_sentence: I had to face the fact that my last performance did indeed suck.
